attributes.action: ensure that the murderers of  police officers, who are or have been convicted and sentenced to life imprisonment, are never released from prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the abolition of the death penalty in the 1960s Police officers were led to believe that life imprisonment would be the tariff for cop killers. We believe that in all cases of murder of police officers, life should mean life.
